content: candygram cowl it s cowl season people this design features a really clever 4 round repeat worked in 2 high contrast colourways resulting in a totally reversible cowl the key is the slipped stitches no stranded knitting required it s so easy you ll need about 200 yds each of 2 colourways of worsted weight yarn - shown here in tfa orange label in natural colour a and pink grapefruit colour b the finished cowl measures 22 in circumference and 14 tall meant to be worn folded over slightly like in the pattern shots
